content: The "Dynamic context being built..." message - add a Skip button to it that cancels dynamic context building. Cancel it by cancelled the api call to chat-with-images, and calling it again with an extra parameter that makes the api not run handleDynamicContext.
No don't change any of the isCancelled stuff in chat-with-images/route.ts

When skipping, it's failing to resend sendChatMessage. Here's the logs:

[Log] dyn ctx skipped
[Log] {role: "user", content: "replace readme.md with French translation", images: [], isComplete: true, apiType: "GPT-4o"}
[Log] user
[Log] resending sendChatMessage
[Error] Unhandled Promise Rejection: AbortError: The operation was aborted.
	(anonymous function) (ChatInterface.tsx:492)
Good. Can you not show the Skip button for the first time dynamic context is getting built?
Didn't work. I think you're calling setIsFirstDynamicContextBuild too early - call setIsFirstDynamicContextBuild when send message completes.
Good. Can you make the Skip button normal looking and not red, and put it right next to the text instead of aligned right in the box.
